text: Ted Kirkpatrick (May 22, 1960 â€“ August 19, 2022) was an American musician and songwriter. He is known for his work with the Christian thrash metal band Tourniquet. Kirkpatrick died from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis (IPF) on August 19, 2022, at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock drummers Category:American bass guitarists Category:American songwriters Category:American bandleaders Category:Musicians from Milwaukee Category:Writers from Milwaukee
